ComicInfo.Characters: Blind Lemon,Bliss,Copycat,Evo,Frostbite,Fuji,Hellstrike,Ivana Baiul,Menlove,Powerhouse,Savage Dragon,Sideways Bob,Smoking Boy,Spawn (Simmons),Sublime,Texas,Threshold,Virginia Dentata,Zealot
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:57:26 [Issue ID 4000-46750] urn:comicvine:4000-46750
ComicInfo.Summary:
The are DV8! Bliss, Copycat, Evo, Frostbite, Powerhaus, Sublime and Threshold - writer Warren Ellis created this hardcore super teen team of anti-heroes as a counterpoint to the lighthearted young super hero teams so prevalent in comics!
DV8 meets the team Twist, Menlove and his Gen-actives.
Nicole discovers than Menlove tried to rape her many years ago, and asks DV8 to kill all these Gen-actives.
One more time, the team has been manipulated by Ivana...
ComicInfo.Title: Some Weird Sin
